snippet: Mr. Rooney led a roller-coaster life: the world’s top box-office star at 19, a bankrupt has-been in his 40s and a comeback kid on Broadway as he neared 60.
abstract: Mickey Rooney, consummate actor and entertainer whose exuberant talent captivated American audiences for nearly nine decades, dies at age 93; Rooney led a roller-coaster life, emerging as world's top box-office star at age 19, falling out of favor in his 40s and returning to Broadway as a comeback kid as he neared his 60s.

byline.contributor: Peter Keepnews, Ashley Southall and Sheelagh McNeil contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Rooney led a roller-coaster life: the world’s top box-office star at 19, a bankrupt has-been in his 40s and a comeback kid on Broadway as he neared 60.

headline.main: Mickey Rooney, Master of Putting On a Show, Dies at 93
headline.print_headline: Mickey Rooney, a Master of Putting On a Show, Is Dead at 93
